metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter expressing delight that Mr. K. Y. Mok will be at the conference and that the event will be held at Phillips Academy. He considers Andover the best possible venue. He notes that Mr. Mok has appointed Mr. T.V. Song (of Harvard and Columbia) to be the Conference Chairman. Kwan requests photos of Andover Hill and a portrait of Stearns that will serve as advertising. Kwan will stay in Andover for the summer term.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
